thread.title: Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl
thread.title_full: Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl

author: USA TODAY
title: Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl
text:
Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl Maybe now is a good time to remind anyone who's a fan of longtime New York radio host Mike... Post to Facebook Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl Maybe now is a good time to remind anyone who's a fan of longtime New York radio host Mike...  //usat.ly/2ikfGyA   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Mike Francesa made gaffe while interviewing Karl Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 12:57 p.m. ET Jan. 11, 2017 1 Shares 
(Photo: WireImage) 
Maybe now is a good time to remind anyone who's a fan of longtime New York radio host Mike Francesa that he's in his final year behind the mic of his drive-time show. 
The WFAN legend interviewed ex-Seattle Supersonics coach George Karl on Tuesday, but he asked about Michael Jordan ending an NBA Finals on a shot in which he pushed off of Bryon Russell. That was against the Utah Jazz in 1998, which means Francesa might have thought he was interviewing ex-Jazz coach Jerry Sloan. Karl and the Sonics lost to Jordan's Bulls in 1996. Francesa had former Sonics coach George Karl in studio today. I'm pretty sure he thought he was interviewing former Jazz coach Jerry Sloan. pic.twitter.com/wcXIZ2PmrZ 
Kudos Karl to being cool about it, though. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2ikfGyA Most Popular
